nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(apm.service.transaction.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) as 'Error rate' FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') AND ((transactionType = 'Web' AND transactionName = 'WebTransaction/Uri/club-manager/index.php')) LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `segmentName` LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Total transactions',percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) as 'Failed transactions (%)', count(*) * percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) / 100 as 'Failed transactions' SINCE 1 month ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE containerId IS NOT NULL) FROM PhpMetadataSummary WHERE php.version.short IS NOT NULL SINCE 1 month ago FACET php.version.short

SELECT apdex(apm.service.apdex) as 'App server', apdex(apm.service.apdex.user) as 'End user' FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT rate(sum(apm.service.cpu.usertime.utilization), 1 second) * 100 as cpuUsage FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `host` LIMIT 20 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT average(apm.service.cpu.usertime.utilization) * 100 as 'Average CPU utilization (%)', average(apm.service.memory.physical) as 'Average memory used (MB)' WHERE appName like '%' SINCE 1 month AGO
SELECT percentile(pageHide, 75), percentile(windowUnload, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web throughput' FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') AND (transactionType = 'Web') LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `Total Usage of Instances` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'Supportability/UsageTotal' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000000 AS `Physical Memory Usage` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'Memory/Physical' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `segmentName` LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT average(apm.service.transaction.duration)*1000 as responseTime FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `host` LIMIT 20 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `Supportability/execute/user/call_count` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'Supportability/execute/user/call_count' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Total transactions', average(duration) as 'Avg duration (s)', percentile(duration, 90) as 'Slowest 10% (s)', percentage(count(*), WHERE error is false) AS 'Success rate' SINCE 1 month AGO
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT percentile(timeToResponseStart, 50) AS 'Back end (Time to first byte)', percentile(duration-timeToResponseStart, 50) AS 'Front end (Window load + AJAX)' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (appId = 556199596) AND (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE containerId IS NOT NULL) FROM PhpMetadataSummary WHERE php.version.short IS NOT NULL SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(newrelic.timeslice.value) AS `Instance Reported` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'Instance/Reporting' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) AND (timingName = 'pageHide') SINCE 1 week AGO
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) WHERE (transactionType = 'Web') SINCE last week EXTRAPOLATE FACET name

widgets.title: Initial Page Load and Route Change

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (appId = 556199596) AND (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) AND (category IN ('Initial page load', 'Route change')) SINCE 1 week AGO FACET CASES (WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AS 'Initial page load (Window load + AJAX)', WHERE category = 'Route change' AS 'Route change') TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT percentile(firstPaint, 50), percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(windowLoad, 50), percentile(firstInteraction, 50) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Total time taken by Other Transactions

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `OtherTransaction/all` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'OtherTransaction/all' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT Count(*) from PhpMetadataSummary facet cases ( where `os.version` like '%el5%' as 'centos5', where `os.version` like '%el6%' as 'centos6', where `os.version` like '%el7%' as 'centos7', where `os.version` like '%el8%' as 'centos8', where `os.version` like '%14.04%' as 'ubuntu 14.04', where `os.version` like '%16.04%' as 'ubuntu 16.04', where `os.version` like '%18.04%' as 'ubuntu 18.04', where `os.version` like '%20.04%' as 'ubuntu 20.04', where `os.version` like '%freeb%' as 'all FreeBSD' ,where `os.version` like '%debian 3.16%' as 'Debian 8', where `os.version` like '%debian 4.9%' as 'Debian 9' ,where `os.version` like '%debian 4.19%' as 'Debian 10', where `os.version` like '%debian 5.10%' as 'Debian 11') since 1 months ago

widgets.title: Longest first input delay by URL

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE (appId = 556199596) AND (firstInteraction < 300) FACET `pageUrl` LIMIT 10 SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT Count(*) from PhpMetadataSummary since 1 month ago
FROM PhpMetadataSummary SELECT uniqueCount(sendingAccount) WHERE php.version.short IS NOT NULL FACET php.version.short  SINCE 1 month ago
select count(*) from AgentState extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php' compare with 1 quarter ago

SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `Supportability/UsageSourceTotal/apm` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName = 'Supportability/UsageSourceTotal/apm' AND `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2' SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT average(apm.service.memory.physical) * rate(count(apm.service.instance.count), 1 minute) / 1000 as memoryUsage FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `host` LIMIT 20 SINCE 1 week AGO
select count(*) from AgentState since 7 days ago facet agentVersion limit 50 extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'
select count(*) from AgentState since 30 days ago facet agentVersionMajor  limit 500 extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'
select count(*) from AgentState since 1 hour ago facet agentAccountId limit 100 extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'
SELECT count(*) from PhpMetadataSummary FACET arch since 3 months ago
select uniqueCount(applicationInstanceId) from AgentState since 1 months ago timeseries max facet agentLanguage extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'
select count(*) from AgentState since 1 month ago timeseries max extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'

select count(*) from AgentState facet cases(WHERE `utilization.aws.id` is not NULL as 'aws', WHERE `utilization.azure.location` is not NULL as 'Azure',where `utilization.gcp.id` is not NULL as 'gcp', where `utilization.pcf.cf_instance_guid` is not NULL as 'pcf') where agentLanguage = 'php'  since 1 month ago extrapolate
select count(*) from AgentState since 7 days ago timeseries max extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php' and agentVersion like '9.17%' or agentVersion like '9.16.0.295' facet agentVersion
select percentage(count(*), where `utilization.docker.id` is not null) from AgentState since 7 days ago extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php' compare with 2 weeks ago

SELECT count(*) from PhpMetadataSummary  facet cases(where `os.version` LIKE '%drupal%' as 'Drupal', where `os.version` LIKE '%cake%' as 'Cake', where `os.version` LIKE '%wordpress%' as 'Wordpress', where `os.version` LIKE '%joomla%' as 'Joomla', where `os.version` LIKE '%magento%' as 'Magento', where `os.version` LIKE '%CodeIg%' as 'CodeIgniter', where `os.version` LIKE '%kohana%' as 'Kohana', where `os.version` LIKE '%laravel%' as 'Laravel', where `os.version` LIKE '%slim%' as 'Slim', where `os.version` LIKE '%silex%' as 'Silex', where `os.version` LIKE '%symfony%' as 'Symfony', where `os.version` LIKE '%yii%' as 'Yii', where `os.version` LIKE '%mediawiki%' as 'MediaWiki', where `os.version` LIKE '%Zend%' as 'Zend')  since 6 months ago
select count(*) from AgentState since 1 hours ago facet applicationName limit 1000 extrapolate where agentLanguage = 'php'
SELECT count(php.metadata.summary) FROM Metric SINCE 1 week ago FACET php.version.short
SELECT uniqueCount(agentAccountId) FROM AgentState SINCE 1 month AGO WHERE agentLanguage = 'php' COMPARE WITH 1 month ago

widgets.title: Top 5 hooks by sum of time consumed

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum((newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000) as 'Wordpress Hooks' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2'  AND metricTimesliceName LIKE 'Framework/WordPress/Hook/%'  WITH METRIC_FORMAT 'Framework/WordPress/{hook}/{name}' FACET `name` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT rate(count(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration), 1 minute) FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `datastoreType` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top 5 Throughput by Function Call Count

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(newrelic.timeslice.value), 1 minute) as 'Wordpress Hooks' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2'  AND metricTimesliceName LIKE 'Framework/WordPress/Hook/%'  WITH METRIC_FORMAT 'Framework/WordPress/{hook}/{name}' FACET `name` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top 5 response time by average call time

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) as 'Wordpress Hooks' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2'  AND metricTimesliceName LIKE 'Framework/WordPress/Hook/%'  WITH METRIC_FORMAT 'Framework/WordPress/{hook}/{name}' FACET `name` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top 5 Database Operations by Time Consumed

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO

SELECT average(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (entity.guid = 'MzUxMDYxM3xBUE18QVBQTElDQVRJT058NTU2MTk5NTk2') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 week AGO
